name: Imagine - Babyz [NDS]
description:
The first ever SIM game focused on babies, Imagine Babyz speaks to the
caring nurturer in you! It points out important tools you need to be a
good sitter while giving you tons of ways to make errands and housework
fun—whether you're dressing the kids up to go shopping, buying baby
food, vacuuming their rooms, painting the walls pink or mowing the lawn.
And the work pays off when you get to spend your hard-earned money on
decorating your house! Ooh-la-la!
